positions.subtitle: E-Cell IIT Roorkee
positions.description: Developed and executed comprehensive social media strategies for E-Cell IIT Roorkee, creating engaging content and managing all social media platforms. Built and nurtured relationships with other college E-Cells, fostering collaboration and spearheading joint initiatives and events. Led cross-campus projects, leveraging collective resources to drive impactful initiatives. Analyzed social media performance metrics, applying data-driven insights to optimize content, increase reach, and boost engagement. Coordinated the production of multimedia content—videos, graphics, and blog posts—enhancing brand visibility and driving audience engagement. Continuously implemented innovative strategies by staying ahead of digital marketing trends and best practices

experience.title: Designer and Volunteer
experience.description: Actively participated in various initiatives focused on village welfare, collaborating with teams to identify needs and develop sustainable solutions in areas such as education, healthcare, sanitation, and environmental conservation. Engaged with local communities to build strong relationships and understand their challenges and aspirations. Contributed to data collection, analysis, and reporting to measure the impact of initiatives, driving continuous improvement. Supported fundraising and awareness campaigns to gather resources for development projects. Additionally, worked as a designer, creating compelling social media posts and videos for platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter, enhancing engagement and generating interest in UBA events and initiatives. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver effective visual content by incorporating feedback and design requirements
